title: Snap not buildable in v1.11.0
body:
#### Current Behavior

Since the snap published is outdated(#2496) I tried to build it myself but the build failed.  This issue is meant to troubleshoot the issue and possibly generate a PR to fix the packaging.

#### Expected Behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->

A buildable snap package

#### Additional context/Screenshots

The build currently fails with:

```
   Compiling cpufeatures v0.2.4
error: failed to run custom build command for `libz-ng-sys v1.1.8`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/root/parts/starship/build/target/release/build/libz-ng-sys-a95a5c285331e8eb/build-script-build_zng` (exit status: 101)
  --- stdout

...stripped...

  HOST_CMAKE = None
  CMAKE = None
  running: "cmake" "/root/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/libz-ng-sys-1.1.8/src/zlib-ng" "-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF" "-DZLIB_COMPAT=OFF" "-DZLIB_ENABLE_TESTS=OFF" "-DWITH_GZFILEOP=ON" "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/root/parts/starship/build/target/release/build/libz-ng-sys-b007719caa92c9a4/out" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS= -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/cc" "-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS= -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/c++" "-DCMAKE_ASM_FLAGS= -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64" "-DCMAKE_ASM_COMPILER=/usr/bin/cc" "-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release"

  --- stderr
  thread 'main' panicked at '
  failed to execute command: No such file or directory (os error 2)
  is `cmake` not installed?

  build script failed, must exit now', /root/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/cmake-0.1.48/src/lib.rs:975:5
```

#### Possible Solution

Refer to the following issue thread for the troubleshooting process.
